name: Agile
entries: You are agile and responsive. This allows you to react quickly to threats, outpacing your opponents and making impressive leaps.

items: You have advantage on opportunity attacks.
If a creature misses you with a melee attack while you are taking the {@action Dodge} action, you can use your reaction to make an opportunity attack against it.
You can use your Dexterity score instead of your Strength score when determining the distance of your long jump and high jump.
